content.rendered:
Maximum Protection from Harmful UV Rays

Problems with Ordinary Lens



Benefits with Lustraa UV+ Coated



  • Filters out harmful UV light from entire lens surface
  • Provides superior UV protection
  • Oil & smudge repellent
  • Water & dust resistant: Anti-reflection
  • Provides crystal clear vision
  • Excellent oleophobic coating features

Lustraa UV+ is the newest generation of Oleophobic Coating offering maximum protection from harmful UV rays by selectively filtering it out from the entire lens. Its special properties also make the lenses oil & smudge repellent, while its dual scratch resistance protects both sides of the lenses. Also water and dust resistant, along with anti-reflection, it is designed to provide crystal clear vision.
